name: Stickman Turbo Car Crash Test Full
name_original: Stickman Turbo Car Crash Test Full
description:
Break these stickmen into pieces! Throw them down from the stairs, smash into the walls, blast with their vehicles and have fun with Stickman Turbo Car Crash Test!
It’s high time to start a crash test experiment! Forget about crash test dummies and mannequins - wreck, smash, destroy and dismount all sorts of cars using stickmen instead of your ragdolls playing ultimate crash test simulator! Perform stunts, crash into the walls, destroy vehicles and have fun demolishing everything on your way!
The more damage you cause, the more points you earn! Try different vehicles (even bicycles or scooters to dismount!) and show the real power of destruction! Be ready for ultimate car destruction fun! Destroy cars, trucks, bicycles and stickmen dummies playing Stickman Turbo Car Crash Test!
Perform amazing stunts and jumps trying to dismount cars entirely with this crash simulator made for all tastes and ages! Be ready for a death race you’ve never tried playing usual driving games! Wreck, crash, demolish and destroy!
Stickman Turbo Car Crash Test features:
Funny stickman crash test simulator
Break all stickmen into the pieces
Earn points to unlock new cars, vehicles, jumps, stunts and other facilities
Try amazing vehicle crash simulator and break all the stickman’s bones to get maximum points! Enjoy demolition fun with Stickman Turbo Car Crash Test!
